title: The Collector / City Survey Officer, as the case may be, on payment of such fees as may be applicabl
clause_text: The Collector / City Survey Officer, as the case may be, on payment of such fees as may be applicable in this behalf, shall ensure that the city survey sheets and property cards are corrected accordingly and fresh property cards are opened for each of the plots giving details regarding the area of the plots and the total area of the floors of the built-up property
